section.name: What is Maven
section.p: To build a Java application, the usual choices are Apache Ant or Maven . The latter provides a rich set of plugins ready to perform various tasks. Some of them are explained in short in this document.

subsection.name: Install Maven
subsection.p: Download and install Maven 1.0.2 or greater. Maven will ease the download of dependencies and source code from cvs, build and install packages.

Maven runs from the command line, but there is an Eclipse plugin to help running plugins from this IDE. See
Mevenide for details.
